slide_content_0: This wiki is about Teardown, a single-player strategy, puzzle and sandbox game with fully destructible, moddable, and customizable voxel-based enviorment. It was developed by Tuxedo Labs. If you have more questions, check the official website out or join the official Teardown Discord server. Make sure to abide by the Rules and Style Guide.
slide_content_1: For Teardown players, this guide will show you how to find a secret tool crate under the map in the lobby area. Let’s check it out. The Operation if you destroy a flat car (until you only have the frame) and flip it upside down, your camera gous under the map, if you are in 1st person. use this to look under the train tracks by the front gate, and you will see a loot crate, if you use the jeep in the shed the same way (make sure it gets placed perfectly) but it will let you go fully under the ground, make sure to save first, for this part is hard. if you make the landing and are standing on the crate, it has every weapon (plus a new one) in it, but it claims it is a pipe bomb. you can’t pick it up. this fact makes me mad. sorry i could not get my screenshots into the guide, but you can check my profile for them. i don’t have any mods. i don’t know how to install them.
slide_content_2: The game begins with you being dropped off and told to walk home. Head towards the Lockelle building on the leftDrag and open the front gates, then remove the boxes from in front of the door. Head inside and you'll be able to pick up some tools. You'll get an extinguisher, spray can and a sledgehammer. Once you pick up your tools, the instructions at the top of the screen will change and you'll be told that you need to replace a fuse to turn the power on. Head outside (towards the white marker) go through the door at the back of the room, and then through the one on the left. On the right, there's a small building. Some trees will be blocking the door. Use the sledgehammer to destroy the trees and go inside. Go to the end of the room and on the left, you can replace the fuse. Go back to the main building. Now you'll be able to access the computer and your emails. This will be where you start each mission and also check and upgrade your tools.
slide_content_3: This is another fairly straightforward mission which shouldn't take too long to complete. But make sure you have a good look around all of the rooms to find some valuables and secrets. These can be spent on tool upgrades later. The first thing you're told is that you can use TAB to open your map and see where each of the primary targets is. You'll also see your location and the what the conditions of the map are (so in this case, there are fire alarms). You'll want to consider the conditions for each level, so you can complete the mission without triggering security. Head towards the factory and open the front gate. The three computers you need to find are in: the office, the harbor office, and the factory. Leave the factory until last and collect the ones in the office and harbor office first. There are propane tanks around this map which you can use to blow holes in walls. There are also vehicles you can make use of that will destroy buildings. Use the map to locate the first two computers in the office and harbor office – use whatever means you prefer to reach them. For the final computer, you'll need to head towards the factory. There is a green vehicle here you can use as a lift. Line this up so you can run up it and jump into the office.
slide_title_4: #4: How to Blue Tape Location and Getting Blue Hand
slide_content_4: Walk into the Security Office and head over to the desk. Grab the Blue Tape by interacting with it and put it in the nearby Blue VCR. Watch the video on the tape. The tape introduces you to using the hands we will get. These hands are very important as they are used to solve most of the puzzles encountered during Chapter 1. When the video concludes the container holding the Blue hand will open. Approach the hand and interact with it to equip it on your character. You get a blue left hand to start with.
slide_content_5: Once you have the Blue hand head back to the reception area. Jump over the turn-style by the front desk to reach a door with a blue hand above it. Shoot your blue hand at the switch to open the door. This door leads you to the factory and the real start of the scary section of the game.
slide_content_6: nside the lobby you will see a few interesting things. The first, and most prominent, is the large toy creature named Huggy Wuggy in the center of the room. Huggy Wuggy is the toy that chases you throughout this chapter. The second thing you will notice is that there are seven doors in this room. These doors lead to different areas of the factory. Before going through any of the doors we need to grab the Yellow Power Room Key dangling from the giant toys hand using your blue hand. To do this shoot the blue hand door to the left. The door won’t open because it has no power. When you do this the Yellow Key will drop into the creatures upraised hand. Use your hand to grab it.
slide_title_7: #7: How to Turn the Power Back On
slide_content_7: n the Power room head to the very end of the room to encounter a socket that is covered. Use the Blue hand to open this cover on the socket. Once the socket is open shoot the Blue hand onto the exposed socket. Hold the Blue hand there and walk around the two electricity conducting poles in the room leading back to the front. Doing this correctly turns the power back on. With the power back on head back to the lobby area. You will notice that Huggy Wuggy is gone. From this point on you will encounter this monster as you explore the other rooms of the building. Are next stop is through the Blue hand door we tried opening without there being power. Open it now and head through it. Go down the hallway and go through the door on your left. Walk down the dark hallway into the next area.
slide_title_8: #8: Tips for Finding New Year’s Gifts
slide_content_8: Dump. The first place you can go is the Pet Dump, which is located next to the Garage. In one of the storage boxes, you can find a lot of New Year’s things. Open several boxes to collect all the items in the Junkyard. Here you can put together a complete herringbone costume and come up with an interesting story with it. One of the boxes will contain antlers and a hat with a Santa Claus pompom. In addition to costumes, you can also find Christmas decorations and toys at the Garbage. We advise you to explore all the boxes to find more holiday items. Mail. The next building in Bob City where you should go for New Year’s items is the Post Office. Going deeper into the hall, you can see vertical shelves - this is a storage (archive) of forgotten things. We advise you to flip the shelves up until the holiday items appear. Keep in mind that items can be on multiple shelves, so flip through them all. Basically, in the post office you can get a variety of fireworks and Christmas-themed toys. Farm. For even more New Year’s items, head to the Farm location to the store with a horse’s head flaunting above. All over the shop you will find various items, you can find among them Christmas gifts, interesting decorations and toys. The picture above shows the location in the shop where you can find gifts and boxes with holiday items.
slide_content_9: Crumpets are tiny pets that you can have at home. They have appeared throughout the Toca Life games, hiding in trees or under manhole covers. Pets come in a wide variety of species and appearances, and each species belongs to the area in which it is found. But to get them, you should look carefully. We’ll give you some tips on where to find your pets. The search is done by the standard hero Nari: Take Nari to the warehouse and give her a slice of pizza (available at the Mall) and a rose (found at the barber shop) to get Midge’s pet. Then take Nari to the Vault and give her the Poop figurine (found in the Apartment) and toilet paper (found in the Mall in the main world) to get the Poop pet. Take Nari to the Vault and give her the Green Band magazine and baguette to get the pet with the pencil. You will also receive the animal with the help of a photo of a lady with glasses from the Quarter and a "bigger flower" from the mail. The purple octopus and the "taller mail flower" will give you another creature. .
slide_title_10: How to get the jet pack alien suit in Wobbly Life
slide_content_10: How get the jet pack // alien suit? 1) You need to start pizza job after 12am (only this hour) 2)Afrer this job starts w/o timer and UFO will appear. 3)All you have to do just follow the damn UFO and deliver pizza to aliens 4)Once thats been completed you'll unlock the alien outfit that will have the jetpack How to equippe suit? You can equippe suit in in each cupboard marked on the map Congratulations! Now you can fly and be green guy like crazy frog 👽
slide_title_11: How To Get Toxic Waste Car
slide_content_11: The Toxic Waste Car is found in Gooey Louie\'s home inside one of the powerplant\'s chimneys. While the Waste Disposal job is in progress Louie moves to the feeding point at the quarry, revealing a small pile of barrels. Interact with them to unlock it.
slide_content_12: Each part is found in a chest within the Temple Puzzles. The first is in the chest immediately on the left in the room the player enters after the hidden path puzzle. The second is down the left path of the maze in a dead end. The third is the opposite side of the memory pattern puzzle room from which the player enters.
slide_content_13: Take the glowing orb from the Temple Puzzles back out the start and the glowing orb from the Waterfall Puzzles into the Mining job. Behind an ore block down in the tunnels are pedestals to put both orbs. The game remembers when one is placed and when the door opens it remains open. Inside the room is a gravestone that must be put through the processor and carted away before the job timer runs out. This then unlocks the pet for purchase.
slide_content_14: Inside the Mountain Lab while small in the Shrinking Machine Lab find all the missing scientists around the room and the UFO key. Complete the middle table platforming. Zipline from the middle table to the lazer maze table and reach the other side. Complete the plank and nail platforming and reach the computer table. Complete the computer puzzle and ride the robot arm to the where the UFO key is.
